official_title: A concurrent resolution disapproving the prohibition of the Investment of Public Funds in Financial Institutions and Companies making loans to or doing business with the Republic of South Africa or Namibia Act of 1983 passed by the City Council of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress disapproves of the Act passed by the District of Columbia Council and signed by the Mayor, namely: The Prohibition of the Investment of Public Funds in Financial Institutions and Companies Making Loans to or Doing Business with the Republic of South Africa or Namibia Act of 1983.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution disapproving the prohibition of the Investment of Public Funds in Financial Institutions and Companies making loans to or doing business with the Republic of South Africa or Namibia Act of 1983 passed by the City Council of the District of Columbia.
